steps.title: Print

BenefitsAndPrice.BottomPriceText: It's never been easier to get your Food Handler Certificate!

Faqs.Answer: In Canada, Food Handler Certification is a legal requirement for many food workers. It’s recommended that anyone who publicly serves food or comes into contact with food receives food safety training to comply with provincial laws.
Faqs.Question: Why do I need a Food Handler Certificate?

Faqs.Answer: Yes, the Food Handler Certification course and final exam are delivered fully online and accessible 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The exam, which is supervised by a certified proctor, requires a webcam and stable internet connection.
Faqs.Question: Is it 100% online?

Faqs.Answer: The online lessons and multiple choice quizzes take most students only 8 hours to complete. How long it will take you depends on your language and self-study skills.
Faqs.Question: Does it really take only 8 hours to complete?

Faqs.Answer: It’s easy — all you need to do is complete the online course and pass the final exam within 30 days from when you register. The course consists of 4 units and each unit contains a series of lessons. The final exam consists of 50 multiple choice questions and you’ll have one hour to complete it and score 70% or higher.
Faqs.Question: What is the process to get my certificate?

FinalCTA.title: Get your Food Handler Certificate in **as little as 8 hours!**
